> **ğŸ“‹ Choose Specialized Template**

> We now offer specialized templates for different types of PRs to help you fill out the information faster:
>
> - ğŸ”§ **[Backend PR Template](./PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/backend.md)** - For Go/API/Trading changes
> - ğŸ¨ **[Frontend PR Template](./PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/frontend.md)** - For UI/UX changes
> - ğŸ“ **[Documentation PR Template](./PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/docs.md)** - For documentation updates
> - ğŸ“¦ **[General PR Template](./PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/general.md)** - For mixed or other changes
>
> **How to use?**
> - When creating a PR, add `?template=backend.md` or other template name to the URL
> - Or simply copy and paste the content from the corresponding template

---

> **ğŸ’¡ Tip:** Recommended PR title format `type(scope): description`
> Example: `feat(trader): add new strategy` | `fix(api): resolve auth issue`
